title: The Best Budget Accommodation in Tenerife
text:
Casa Esmeralda 

Casa Esmeralda is purely for those who like luxury experiences. It is truly beautiful hotel which assures you the value of your money as you will be in a tranquil environment. It is on the outskirts of a little town in the southern side of the Tenerife called San Isidro. If you are looking for Tenerife holiday apartments near nature then this is it. It is just a few meters from the national park as well as some of the breathtaking slopes of the mountains. You will also be getting a glimpse at the ocean. There is no traffic that passes close to the hotel and so it is completely peaceful and tranquil with no disturbance at all. Some of the facilities that you will get from Casa Esmeralda include surfboard hire, computer, TV, internet, roof terrace, pool table, lounge, barbeque, and washing machine. There are also airport transfer services which also assure you of easy movement.
